评论概述: It's good, but not for me.
评论详情: I needed a new wallet after my old one got destroyed in the washer. I decided to try one of those "convenient" clip on wallets. It was fine, but was no where near the level of my previous wallet.  It was in fairness, very sturdy the metal plates were very solid. However the bands that hold the two metal plates together will wear down over time, and become more stretched out over time. To the point where it can't even hold like 2 or more cards.  Price was ok, but not really worth it in my opinion. If the product was better quality or the price knocked down like 2-3 bucked I'd say the price was worth it.  TLDR: Get this if you need a get out of gift free card for a family member, that you don't really care about... that also happens to really need a wallet.
I like it's slim and small, but cards are crowded and are hard to take out, they get damaged from taking them out and putting them back in.

I purchased a Ridge a couple of years back for over 100 bucks and was about to purchase another (The metal clip kept falling out, and the elastic had become loose) .. During my search, I saw this for 8 bucks ... they are almost identical ... aside from the screws and the texture of the metal; construction-wise, if you slapped the Ridge logo on this wallet, you would not even question its authenticity.  In hindsight, I wish I had researched and found this wallet first, as I could've put the saved 92 bucks in the clip ...
Very small footprint but yet holds lots of cards
i’ve had this wallet for about 2 years now and it’s holding up perfect! it’s scratched up from taking hits and falls but that just add to the character. if your considering this wallet, get it
